detaileddescription.para: for more than 256 literals in a chunk
forcibly get the raw value of the literal
declare a type to be used (as a literal)
declare a type to be used (as a long literal)
declare a variable to be used (as a literal)
declare a variable to be used (as a long literal)
declare a function to be used (as a literal)
declare a function to be used (as a long literal)
temporarily change a type of an atomic value
get the type of a variable
